Definition.WordDefinition: Religiously \Re*li"gious*ly\, adv. In a religious manner. --Drayton. [1913 Webster]

religiously adv 1: by religion; "religiously inspired art" [syn: {sacredly}] 2: with extreme conscientiousness; "he came religiously every morning at 8 o'clock" [syn: {scrupulously}, {conscientiously}]
